Name: Pico Link
About the game: Pico Link is a software that allows users to connect VR devices to computers to play games. If you have got a Pico VR device, you can quickly connect to the computer through this software, and configure the streaming options on the computer. Start to experience the exciting game content, the software interface is simple, the device connection process is displayed, you can connect to the device through 5G routing or DP cable. Software functions are still very simple, and detailed tutorials are also attached, allowing users to quickly configure VR devices to play games. There're several points you should know: 1、Pico Link only supports Pico VR devices , but not any other VR headset 2、When you choose DP link mode on this Pico VR devices, you should download and install this 'Pico Link' App first.
